import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Book } from 'src/app/models/book'; @Component({ selector: 'app-books', templateUrl: './books.component.html', styleUrls: ['./books.component.css'] }) export class BooksComponent { public book1:Book; constructor(){ this.book1 = new Book(127, 40040, "Dejar ir", "Autoayuda", "Dr. David Hawkins", 19.99, "https://i.pinimg.com/564x/01/78/37/017837a9e9bafa661ec7ba9c30b32dac.jpg") } }
img src="..." class="card-img-top" alt="...">
{{book1.title}}
